issue.title: [Python] OwnedRef is fragile
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2171](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2171). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some uses of OwnedRef can implicitly invoke its (default) copy constructor, which will lead to extraneous decrefs.
